articles.author: Joseph Ziegler
articles.description: Myrtle Creek Police are investigating a Sunday night robbery outside Columbia Bank. A man reported two masked suspects stole a deposit and threatened to shoot him before fleeing on foot. Anyone with info is asked to call MCPD at 440-4471.
articles.title: Myrtle Creek Police Investigating Robbery Outside Bank

articles.author: Joseph Ziegler
articles.description: Deputies arrested 38-year-old Jesse Dewbre after he fled the Douglas County Courthouse Tuesday when a judge ordered him into custody. He was later found at his home and surrendered. Dewbre faces escape and warrant charges; bail set at $100,000.
articles.title: Man Arrested After Escaping From Douglas County Courthouse

articles.author: Joseph Ziegler
articles.description: DFPA has six prescribed burns scheduled this week: Sept. 16 in Oakland & Roseburg, Sept. 17 in Oakland & Roseburg, Sept. 18 on N. Umpqua Hwy in Roseburg, and Sept. 20 on Roberts Creek Rd in Roseburg. Burns aim to reduce wildfire risk under safe conditions.
articles.title: DFPA Confirms Six Prescribed Burns Scheduled This Week

articles.description: Authorities are investigating a robbery that occurred at Columbia Bank on Northwest Pleasant Street, according to the Myrtle Creek Police Department.
articles.title: Two suspects sought in Myrtle Creek bank robbery incident

articles.author: Chelsea Deffenbacher
articles.description: A Roseburg man faces serious charges after accusations of filming and sexually abusing a child, according to Douglas County Circuit Court records.
articles.title: Roseburg man charged with child sex abuse caught on video

articles.author: News Staff
articles.description: Tragedy struck at Shady Point RV Park, just south of Roseburg, where three individuals were found dead and one in medical distress from a suspected drug overdose.
articles.title: Three people found dead in RV from suspected overdoses
